data.client_settings: Desktop app main release, updated on May 18th 2018
data.actual_result: An abrupt jump to most recent messages. If done from a search, the chat scrolls very quickly to the most recent messages.
data.expected_result: For the message to go back into normal mode but not to scroll at all; this is what happens when selecting 'cancel' with the mouse instead
data.short_description: Cancelling an edit with ESC far back enough in the history to have option to jump to most recent messages zooms back to most recent messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a point in message history far back enough to have 'You're viewing older messages' at the bottom of the screen  - Right-click and select edit - Press escape key to cancel
